useCase.name: Design Social Media Wireframe
useCase.description: Design a wireframe for social media platform based on user insights and brand guidelines.

preconditions.precondition: Designer has received design requirements from the Project Team.
Design Guidelines and User Research insights are available.

successEndConditions.condition: Wireframe design is approved by the Project Team.

mainSequence.step: Designer requests design requirements from the Project Team.
Project Team queries User Research for user needs and preferences.
User Research provides insights to the Project Team.
Project Team requests brand guidelines from Design Guidelines.
Design Guidelines provide brand guidelines to the Designer.
Designer analyzes user insights and brand guidelines.
Designer submits the wireframe for feedback from the Project Team.
Project Team provides feedback to the Designer.
Designer revises the wireframe based on feedback.
Designer resubmits the revised wireframe to the Project Team.
Designer starts design implementation based on the approved wireframe.
